We'd love to hear what you think of our customer service. Please take a moment to answer one simple question by clicking the link below:

https://support.combinate.me/requests/26392/satisfaction/new/MDJa83CrlenMEvV7Vp05gkAwz?locale=1176

Here's a reminder of what your ticket was about:

The site looks great!

Regards,
Alyssa

The updates have now propagated, and the website is loading fine.

Thanks,

Thanks,

Heath Maguire

Thanks,

Heath Maguire
